metadata.title: CVE-2021-36754 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: PowerDNS Authoritative Server 4.5.0 before 4.5.1 allows anybody to crashthe process by sending a specific query (QTYPE 65535) that causes anout-of-bounds exception.

criterions.comment: pdns: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
